__compat.description: Execute the UI method of the selected node.

android.notes: Does not support usage on `NodesRef` created through `SelectorQuery.proptotype.selectAll()`.

ios.notes: Does not support usage on `NodesRef` created through `SelectorQuery.proptotype.selectAll()`.

web_lynx.notes: Does not support usage on `NodesRef` created through `SelectorQuery.proptotype.selectAll()`.
